main event: A bright white light, size of a grapefruit, was observed hovering at Tyndall AFB, Florida, on 18 September 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes,The object was observed to move north slowly before disappearing,The object appeared to be under intelligent control and behaved differently from known satellites, Two competent observers recorded the sighting, The object was described as elliptical and brighter than a star.
